Headline: #20 Madison Temporary Reroute at Madison/Laramie
ShortDescription: 20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted via Madison, Central, Washington, Laramie and Madison, due to street blockage near Madison/Laramie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#20 Madison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Madison, Central, Washington, Laramie and Madison, due to street blockage near Madison/Laramie.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Logan Square due to earlier police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with delays near Logan Square due to earlier police activity.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
